law.catch_line: Embezzlement Or Misappropriation Of Trust Funds; Fraud; Penalties
law.text: Any trustee, plan administrator, official, employee or other person who is convicted of embezzling or misappropriating trust funds or funds, securities or other property entrusted to his care or custody, or of falsification of records or destruction of records with intent to defraud, or of willfully and knowingly filing false statements or of violating the provision of subsection (c) of section three, shall be punished by a fine of not more than ten thousand dollars or by imprisonment in a jail or house of correction for not more than five years, or both.
